name: Honke Hanafuda
overview: Honke ("Chief Household") Hanafuda, or simply Hanafuda, is a virtual hanafuda card game simulator for the Super Famicom. It features multiple different modes and AI opponents, and an assortment of photographic backgrounds. It was developed by Aisystem Tokyo, which would go on to create Super Famicom Igo and Shogi games later the same year. Hanafuda sits between Super Hanafuda and Hanafuda Ou in a series of hanafuda simulators released for the Super Famicom in the latter half of 1994.
